subtasks.title: Initialize Firestore and Configure Security Rules
subtasks.description: Set up Firestore in the Firebase project and configure security rules to ensure data privacy.

Enable Firestore in the Firebase console. Define security rules to restrict access based on user authentication and roles. Test rules using the Firebase emulator.
<info added on 2025-11-04T22:05:24.672Z>
✅ Completed subtask 1.1: Initialize Firestore and Configure Security Rules

**What was done:**
1. Installed Firebase SDK (`npm install firebase`)
2. Created Firebase configuration files:
   - `firebase.json` - Main Firebase configuration with Firestore, Functions, Hosting, and emulator settings
   - `firestore.rules` - Comprehensive security rules for all collections:
     - Students: Users can only access their own data
     - Sessions: Read/write access based on studentId
     - Practice Items: Full CRUD for own items
     - Conversations: Read/write own conversations
     - Notifications: Read own notifications, create only via server functions
3. Created `firestore.indexes.json` - Empty indexes file (can be populated as needed)
4. Created `.firebaserc` - Project configuration (needs project ID update)
5. Created `src/services/firebase.ts` - Firebase initialization for React app with:
   - Firestore, Auth, Functions initialization
   - Emulator support for development
   - Cloud Messaging setup with token management
   - Helper functions for notifications
6. Created `functions/` directory structure with:
   - `package.json` - Functions dependencies
   - `tsconfig.json` - TypeScript configuration
   - `src/index.ts` - Sample function template
7. Updated `.gitignore` to exclude Firebase debug files

**Next Steps:**
- Update `.firebaserc` with actual Firebase project ID
- Configure environment variables in `.env` file
- Test security rules using Firebase emulator
</info added on 2025-11-04T22:05:24.672Z>
subtasks.testStrategy: Use Firebase emulator to test security rules.

subtasks.testStrategy: Measure load times before and after implementation to ensure improvement.

subtasks.title: Optimize Map Images for Faster Loading
subtasks.description: Reduce the size of map images to improve loading speed across devices.
subtasks.details: Compress map images using modern formats like WebP and apply responsive image techniques to serve different sizes based on device.
subtasks.testStrategy: Compare image load times and quality across different devices and resolutions.

subtasks.title: Test Map Performance on Multiple Devices
subtasks.description: Ensure map loads efficiently on various devices by conducting performance tests.
subtasks.details: Use tools like Lighthouse and WebPageTest to evaluate map performance on different devices and network conditions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Document performance metrics and identify any device-specific issues.

tasks.title: Integrate with Existing Systems
tasks.description: Ensure seamless integration with existing question and gamification systems.
tasks.details: Connect the new learning path system with existing question generation and gamification systems. Ensure compatibility and data consistency.
tasks.testStrategy: Test integration points to ensure data flows correctly between systems and that existing functionalities remain unaffected.

subtasks.title: Identify Integration Points
subtasks.description: Determine specific integration points with existing systems.
subtasks.details: Review the architecture of the question generation and gamification systems to identify where integration is required.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify identified points align with system requirements.

subtasks.title: Develop Integration Interfaces
subtasks.description: Create interfaces for seamless data exchange between systems.
subtasks.details: Design and implement APIs or data exchange protocols to facilitate communication between the new learning path system and existing systems.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data exchange using mock data to ensure compatibility.

subtasks.title: Perform Compatibility Checks
subtasks.description: Ensure new system components are compatible with existing systems.
subtasks.details: Conduct thorough compatibility testing to ensure that the new system components work with existing question generation and gamification systems.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run integration tests to confirm data consistency and system stability.

subtasks.title: Conduct Integration Testing
subtasks.description: Test the integration to ensure seamless operation.
subtasks.details: Perform end-to-end testing to ensure that data flows correctly and existing functionalities remain unaffected.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use test cases to simulate real-world scenarios and verify system behavior.

tasks.title: Conduct User Testing and Feedback Collection
tasks.description: Gather user feedback to refine the system before launch.
tasks.details: Conduct beta testing with a group of students to gather feedback on usability and engagement. Use this feedback to make necessary adjustments before full launch.
tasks.testStrategy: Analyze user feedback and make iterative improvements to enhance the overall user experience.

subtasks.title: Set Up User Testing Environment
subtasks.description: Prepare the environment and resources needed for conducting user testing with students.
subtasks.details: Coordinate with the IT team to set up necessary hardware and software. Ensure that all testing devices have the latest version of the system installed. Schedule testing sessions with selected students and prepare any required documentation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that all testing devices are operational and have the correct system version.

subtasks.title: Analyze User Feedback and Report Findings
subtasks.description: Collect and analyze feedback from user testing sessions to identify areas for improvement.
subtasks.details: Gather feedback from students through surveys and interviews. Use qualitative and quantitative methods to analyze the data. Compile a report highlighting key findings and suggested improvements for the system.
subtasks.testStrategy: Review the feedback report with stakeholders to ensure all critical issues are addressed.

tasks.title: Enhance UI Foundation for Consistent Design System
tasks.description: Improve layout, typography, and design system to achieve a modern educational game aesthetic.
tasks.details: Revise the UI foundation by addressing layout and typography issues. Ensure text width does not exceed 800px for readability. Adjust container max-widths for better spacing and visual balance. Establish a cohesive design system inspired by modern educational games like Duolingo, focusing on a game-like aesthetic. Implement consistent color schemes and typography styles across the application. Collaborate with the design team to ensure alignment with the overall user experience goals.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct visual inspections to ensure text widths and container sizes adhere to design specifications. Verify that the design system is consistently applied across different UI components. Perform user testing to gather feedback on readability and aesthetic appeal. Use automated UI testing tools to ensure layout consistency across different screen sizes and devices.
